name: Hexagon Grid Game
description:
How to play

The difficulty slider on the start menu will change several factors to adjust the games difficulty. Your goal is to defend the blue tower from waves of enemies by building a defense out of attacking towers and walls. Place buildings by first selecting one in the shop then clicking on any grass tile if you have enough money. There is a countdown between waves that can be skipped by clicking the 'start wave'  button in the top left. Building health and range can be viewed simply by hovering the mouse over any building.

Features
  • 4 towers
  • 9 unique enemies including 3 bosses
  • 3 levels with different maps
